metadata.subject: Stereotyping (Printing)
Booksellers and bookselling
metadata.title: Editions stéréotypes
metadata.creator: Didot, Pierre,1761-1853
Didot, Pierre, 1761-1853
Didot, Firmin, 1764-1836
Herhan, Louis-Étienne, 1768-1854
metadata.description: "Les citoyens Pierre Didot, imprimeur au Louvre, Firmin Didot, graveur et fondeur, ... et Louis-Etienne Herhan ... se sont associés ..."--P. [1]

"On s'adressera, pour la vente des éditions ou formats solides, aux citoyens Pierre Didot l'aîné, imprimeur, aux galeries du Louvre, et Firmin Didot, libraire, graveur et fondeur en caractères, rue de Thionville, à Paris"--P. 4
Offers for sale inexpensive stereotyped editions or, particularly for printers and booksellers outside of Paris, the stereotype plates themselves
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
